name: Dicin' with Chaos
description:
Roll dice to get point, invest point into more dice, profit!

Controls:

Hold CLICK on the dice and throw it to gain casino chips.     
Press SPACE to enter/leave the shop.

Instructions:

While you throw the dice some annoyances will occur, here is how to avoid them:  

-Fire. You can stop it by throwing a water balloon at it.
-Earthquakes. You can stop it by throwing a nail at it.
-Wind. It will blow your items away so drag them into the direction the wind's coming from.
-Lasers. When they are turned on they can damage your dice, but when they are off they can not.

The shop consists of 4 items:

-Dice. If your dice is damaged you can buy another one!
-Water balloon. You can use the water balloon to stop the fire!
-Nail. You can use the nail to stop the earthquakes!
-Healing bot. You can use the healing bot to heal your damaged dice!

Made in 48 hours for the annual GMTK (2022) game jam.
